comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Bruce2jiang>@Bruce2jiang</denchmark-link> , You'll need to be a little more specific with your question. Can you please follow one of our corresponding templates, and add information about what exactly you mean by "monitor Alluxio"? Have you tried looking for an answer at <denchmark-link:https://docs.alluxio.io>https://docs.alluxio.io</denchmark-link> ?
Closing this issue due to inactivity. Please reopen it if you need more help.
